decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed front porch by reason of its excessive width and depth, would be unduly obtrusive in the street scene and would be detrimental to the character and appearance of the host building and the locality, contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 D(1) and (11) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).

Reason : 2 - The proposed single storey rear extension, by reason of its excessive bulk, rearward projection and height, would be unduly obtrusive, result in overshadowing and loss of outlook, and would be detrimental to the visual and residential amenities of the occupiers of the adjacent property, No. 78 Bromefield, Stanmore. HA7 1AQ, contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3. D(7) of The  London Plan (2021), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).
description: Front porch; single storey rear extension; raised patio with balustrade and external steps to rear; external alterations (demolition of rear bay window)
